mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.perms FROM sys_menu p LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.perms is not null and p.perms!='' and p.status=1
SELECT a.permission_id,b.name,b.parent_id FROM sys_role_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b on a.permission_id = b.permission_id WHERE a.role_id = #{roleId} and b.status=1

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.permission_id, p.name, p.description, p.url, p.parent_id, p.icon, p.order_num FROM sys_menu p LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.type in(0,1) and p.status=1 ORDER BY p.order_num
